featured.text: In others, words can trigger a real sensation of taste on their tongue. 31
People who learned a second language later in life used a special part of Broca’s area for their second language—near the one activated for their native tongue.

definition.zh_def: 舌頭，位於口腔內的肌肉組織，主要用於品嚐、說話和吞嚥。
definition.en_def: The muscular organ in the mouth used for tasting, speaking, and swallowing.
definition.example: She stuck out her tongue to show her playful side.
